parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is standard open application id successfully issued by all dealers

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API system, using to identify user permissions to the api, required for all requests

parameters.name: error_id
parameters.description: Request unique identifier for a error

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id api call, timestamp, access_token, and api path

parameters.name: value_unit
parameters.description: Unit of attribute value (quantitative attribute unit)

parameters.name: original_value_name
parameters.description: Original value name from source API affiliate unit

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Normally error details if not error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: warning
response_fields.description: Normally empty, details if not empty. Empty if no warning

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: certification_rule_list
response_fields.description: New description test. Only relevant when can use it. If you use full free version cannot use this type API
